name: Hill Ambulance Parking Simulator- Rescue Drive 17
name_original: Hill Ambulance Parking Simulator- Rescue Drive 17
description:
Latest 911 rescue ambulance service brings fun for duty drivers on the snow hill roads. Fasten your seatbelt and receive the emergency alert on the emergency radio installed in your 911 rescue ambulance car.

Challenging Life Saving crazy Ambulance Driving
Be a life saver, provide emergency 911 services as a rescue ambulance driver. Carry the emergency doctor to hilltop from the city hospital. Look out for the snow plow trucks and the slippery frozen hill climb paths. No rules and no traffic control in the latest 911 rescue simulation. A hill racing test for all Russian truck drivers. Don’t fall into the trenches at the red cross American training parkour for emergency doctors and duty drivers.

Real accidents Scenarios
Helicopter crash due to snow storm, landslide caused slow plow truck and passenger bus accident. A prisoner police bus glided over the frozen ice to hit the snow hills and mountains. Many families attending Happy New Year functions skidded off the snow. Save them and many others in this 911 rescue simulator.

Rescue the victims in this nerve wrecking hill climber ambulance simulator
Step up fast in the driving hospital truck and fly through the barriers to victims. Help them on site or take the victim back to the hospital as fast as possible! Get to know your extreme car driving speed and helicopter flying skills. Complete all the nerve wrecking missions of this perfect 911 rescue ambulance simulator. Unlock the rescue helicopter and get highscore for patient redemption to win the life saver title.

Key Features:
• Amazing big 3D map to fly through!
• Realistic models of ambulances and rescue helicopters
• Nerve wrecking life-saving missions
• Open world map of snow hill in winter
• 10 Real Accident scenario
• Automated control with amazing driving physics
